StageAttention: ['A mechanoid doctor born to devour the poisons of the human heart. With silk and claw, she weaves deadly illusions in a hopeless offering to her lost love.', 'Melinoe ensnares her target in spider webs, disabling movement and dodge. While the target is web-bound, Melinoe only uses parriable attacks. The bind is broken after several successful parries or if the target is hit.', "Melinoe the target within a veil of tears, restricting the target's movement area. During this time, her attacks can be parried.", 'Melinoe transforms spider silk into a slingshot and launches a charged projectile. The attack can be parried if the target is web-bound.', 'Melinoe manipulates her webs to launch a sweeping area attack or hoist herself above the battlefield to vanish from sight. This attack can be parried when the target is web-bound.', 'Melinoe sacrifices her life force to form crystalline blossoms that erupt, dealing explosive damage to the entire battlefield.']
StageAttentionTitle: ['Melinoe', "Dreamweaver's Bind", 'Weeping Cocoon', 'Web Ambush', 'Threads of Fate', 'Soul Bloom Ritual']
